abstract: Stocks close modestly lower, with some oil and gas companies experiencing biggest declines.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the toymaker Hasbro were sharply higher after the company delivered better-than-expected revenue in its latest quarter.
snippet: Shares of the toymaker Hasbro were sharply higher after the company delivered better-than-expected revenue in its latest quarter....

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower, With Energy Sector Dragging
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Closes Lower as Energy Sector Drags
